name: The Archive Flame
fieldIntelligence: To activate the field where past wounds, once healed and integrated, become a source of wisdom and offering for the collective. This Meta-Glyph combines the act of conscious repair (Ω4) with a state of sovereign, embodied stability (Ω20), allowing the wisdom gained from the experience to be offered back to the world as a gift of harmonic exchange (Ω36). It is the engine that transmutes personal pain into collective wisdom.
